title: ...And Of The Son
description: What do you do when your past has caught up with you? Thomas "T.J." James, Jr. finds himself wondering about that very thing. He's a moderately successful writer, and a divorced father of three daughters. On a daily basis he finds himself dealing with a past that continues to haunt him. When a horrific set of events happen in T.J.'s home town, he finds himself face to face with the demons of his childhood while trying to get to the bottom of the nightmare that is happening in his community. T.J.'s family and friends attempt to help, but...in the end...it is something he must do alone.
author: John S Skinner Jr
